the warlock tabl show how mani spell slot you have to cast your warlock spell of 1st through 5th level. the tabl also show what the level of those slot is; all of your spell slot are the same level. to cast one of your warlock spell of 1st level or higher, you must expend a spell slot. you regain all expend spell slot when you finish a short or long rest.
